rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance area with ample space for movement and storage.

vastu.importance: Entry must face east or north; however, special consideration given to west-facing plot.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Lively open space with Bohemian decor, large windows for natural light, wheelchair accessible pathways.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living area with ample seating for guests.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with wheelchair accessible counters and appliances, located in the south-west corner to align with local norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and balcony overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for guest use or family members, with adjacent storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for children or extended family members, with a small study area integrated.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for family use, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater with soundproofing, wheelchair accessible seating, and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small bathroom for guests with accessibility features and modern fixtures.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door with ramp leading to courtyard.

openings.name: Window Set
openings.description: Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation.

courtyard.description: Central open courtyard promoting natural light, ventilation, and a sense of openness in accordance with Vastu principles. Contains landscaped garden area with seating for relaxation.
